Text: I'll comment here as it's your latest post I love your releases but I was wondering if you could do a pack for Fantastic Four 588 up until whatever was the latest? I cant find 588 or or few further and then the arc hits something new if you could it would be awesome!
TY for all you do here btw

Fuel87:C'mon man,you didn't even search for it...just type fantastic four in others category...I uploaded even few packs and anyway fantastic four ended with fantastic four# 588,switched on to ff (future foundation)#01,and then went ongoing with 600.So basically you're asking me to upload pack of 4 issues which can be found on TPB and they have seeds...think about it...
Fuel87, a quick search will yield you the entire series all the way back to issue 1.
